name: Time Route
description:
Being a time traveler can sometimes be difficult. Especially when you accidentally time travel into a time travel prison. To time out of it, you now have to complete puzzles several times - all while trying to not get seen by your past self. That would set off the worst of time paradoxes!

Controls: 

  • WASD or arrow keys to move.
  • To restart the current level, pause the game with ESC and hit R.

Made by:

  • rubr - Programming and Art;
  • Rafael Giordanno - Music and SFX;
  • Shouke - Art.

You can play and download the music here.

Made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 23.
